casebody.data:
Bernard M. SHOTKIN, also Known as Barnay M. Shotkin, etc., v. THOMAS A. EDISON, Incorporated. No. 3505. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Sept 12, 1947. Writ of Certiorari Denied Nov. 10, 1947. See 68 S.Ct. 146. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the District of Colorado. Bernard M. Shotkin, pro se. Edward S. Rogers, William T. Woodson, and Beverly W. Pattishall, all of Chicago, Ill., and Elmer L. Brock and John R. Turnquist, both of Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON, and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal, 69 F.Supp. 176, dismissed on motion of appellee.
